summary: The devastating reconstruction of the rape and murder of a 15-year-old Iraqi girl by American soldiers in Samarra in 2006.
cast: Izzy Diaz|Rob Devaney|Ty Jones|Anas Wellman|Mike Figueroa|Yanal Kassay|Dhiaa Khalil|Kel O'Neill|Daniel Stewart Sherman|Patrick Carroll|Qazi Freihat|Adel Odai|Helen Zamel|Hiyam Abdel Karim|Issam Shamary|Shukraya Maran|Sahar Alloul|Happy Anderson|Mazen Zoubi|Zahra Zubaidi|Sabrine Munther|Shatha Haddad|Karima Attayey|Suhail Abdel Hussein|Hameed Sahi|Bridget Barkan|Ohad Knoller|Paul O'Brien|Paul Hijazin|Jafar Zoubi|Nick Seeley|Don McKellar|Abigail Savage|Andrew Cullen|Francois Caillaud|Lara Atalla|Julie Thiery
title: Redacted
